game.name: Banana Hell: Mountain of Madness
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Jump your way to get the blue diamond as you try to survive a very annoying banana monologue! A REALLY HARD game!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Jump your way to get the blue diamond as you try to survive a very annoying banana monologue! A REALLY HARD game!

reviewHighlights.text: I played it I listened to the song I fell a few times I got angry I left And wrote this
Another freebie? Don't mind me. I feel like this is the kind of precision platformer that for some reason, by trying to be annoying with weird dialogu...
